about_the_game:
Journey into the depths of consciousness in "All Songs are from the King," a haunting psychological horror experience that transcends traditional gaming boundaries.

‘We are not human beings having a spiritual experience; we are spiritual beings having a human experience.’ - Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

Step into a World Where Poetry Meets Horror

All Songs Are From the King is not just a game—it's an emotional and intellectual journey into the depths of human existence. Inspired by the haunting atmosphere of Silent Hills P.T. and the spiritual wisdom of the worlds mystics, this psychological horror masterpiece invites you to explore the fragile boundaries between reality, spirituality, and the unknown.

Key Features & Benefits:

  • A Unique Fusion of Horror and Philosophy: Dive into a narrative that intertwines psychological horror with timeless mystical poetry. Explore profound themes of life, suffering, and death while unravelling your own existential fears.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Traverse eerie environments that shift between dimensions and realities. Each setting is meticulously designed to evoke awe, dread, and introspection.

  • Challenging Puzzles & Clues: Test your mind with intricate puzzles that force you to confront not just your surroundings but your own understanding of existence. Every note, every clue you uncover deepens the mystery.

  • Philosophical Storytelling: Experience a narrative that dares to ask life’s biggest questions. As you progress, the game challenges your perception of reality and immerses you in a deeply personal exploration of meaning.

  • Stunning Sound Design: Let haunting whispers and evocative music guide you through this surreal world. The audio experience is crafted to heighten tension and immerse you fully in the game’s chilling atmosphere.

Why Play?

If you’re a fan of games like Silent Hill PT, SOMA, or The Medium, All Songs Are From the King offers a fresh take on psychological horror. It’s not just about scares—it’s about introspection, emotion, and unraveling the mysteries of existence itself. Whether you're drawn to philosophical depth or spine-chilling suspense, this game delivers an unforgettable experience.

Dare to Explore Your Own Humanity

Are you ready to confront your deepest fears and question everything you know about life? All Songs Are From the King is more than a game—it’s an odyssey into the unknown.

Prepare yourself for an experience that will leave you haunted long after the credits roll.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains implied violence, blood and one instance of mild/blurred nudity.
